title: How to Login to Yelp

steps.headline: Locate the "Log In" button up in the top right corner of the browser-screen.
Click the "Log In" button.
steps.description:
This will send you to the Yelp login page. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/e0\/Login-to-Yelp-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/e0\/Login-to-Yelp-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Click into the Email Address box.
Type your Email Address you entered when you created your account (or, if you've changed it, the most current email address it's been changed to).
Type the most current Password you have for your account.
Press ↵ Enter when the correct password has been entered.
Wait for the site to fully login to your account.
steps.description: When you are properly logged in, you'll see your profile's (real name) in the top right corner (in the place of the words "Log In").

steps.headline: Power on and unlock your iPhone.
steps.description: Type in your 4-digit pin (if you have one installed).

steps.headline: Download and install Yelp for iPhone app from the Apple AppStore (if you haven't done so already).
Open the Yelp for iPhone app.
Type your Email Address you entered when you created your account into the "Email Address" box.
steps.description: (If you've changed it, type the most current email address it's been changed to into the box).

steps.headline: Type the most current Password you have for your account into the "Password" box.
Tap the "Log In" button to login to your account.

text:
Via the Website Open your web browser. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/c/c1/Login-to-Yelp-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/c/c1/Login-to-Yelp-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Visit the Yelp homepage. Locate the "Log In" button up in the top right corner of the browser-screen. Click the "Log In" button. This will send you to the Yelp login page. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e0/Login-to-Yelp-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e0/Login-to-Yelp-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Click into the Email Address box. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/3/35/Login-to-Yelp-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/3/35/Login-to-Yelp-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Type your Email Address you entered when you created your account (or, if you've changed it, the most current email address it's been changed to). {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/64/Login-to-Yelp-Step-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/64/Login-to-Yelp-Step-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Tab down to the "Password" box. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/b/b8/Login-to-Yelp-Step-7.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/b/b8/Login-to-Yelp-Step-7.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Type the most current Password you have for your account. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/9/96/Login-to-Yelp-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/9/96/Login-to-Yelp-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Press ↵ Enter when the correct password has been entered. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/a3/Login-to-Yelp-Step-9.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/a3/Login-to-Yelp-Step-9.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Wait for the site to fully login to your account. When you are properly logged in, you'll see your profile's (real name) in the top right corner (in the place of the words "Log In"). Via the iPhone App Power on and unlock your iPhone. Type in your 4-digit pin (if you have one installed). Download and install Yelp for iPhone app from the Apple AppStore (if you haven't done so already). Open the Yelp for iPhone app. Type your Email Address you entered when you created your account into the "Email Address" box. (If you've changed it, type the most current email address it's been changed to into the box). Type the most current Password you have for your account into the "Password" box. Tap the "Log In" button to login to your account.

Locate the "Log In" button up in the top right corner of the browser-screen.
Click the "Log In" button.
This will send you to the Yelp login page.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/9\/96\/Login-to-Yelp-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/9\/96\/Login-to-Yelp-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Press ↵ Enter when the correct password has been entered.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/a3\/Login-to-Yelp-Step-9.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/a3\/Login-to-Yelp-Step-9.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Wait for the site to fully login to your account.
When you are properly logged in, you'll see your profile's (real name) in the top right corner (in the place of the words "Log In").
Via the iPhone App Power on and unlock your iPhone.
Type in your 4-digit pin (if you have one installed).
Download and install Yelp for iPhone app from the Apple AppStore (if you haven't done so already).
Open the Yelp for iPhone app.
Type your Email Address you entered when you created your account into the "Email Address" box.
(If you've changed it, type the most current email address it's been changed to into the box).
Type the most current Password you have for your account into the "Password" box.
Tap the "Log In" button to login to your account.
